what_to_watch: Equipment floor plans — exact placement and clearances
Equipment schedules (K-801, K-802) — model numbers, dimensions, utility requirements
Electrical rough-in elevations — outlet heights, circuit requirements per equipment
Plumbing rough-in elevations — drain locations, water supply points
Kitchen details — countertop heights, pass-through dimensions, hood details
common_superintendent_questions: What equipment goes in this location?
What are the electrical requirements for this piece of equipment?
Where are the floor drains in the kitchen?
What's the rough-in height for this outlet?
